fields.fieldTitle: What's the Name / Title of whatever you're selling?

fieldHint.hint1: (Ex: Traffic Explosion, Neuracel, 7 Day Ebook, etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: How much does what you're selling cost?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Free, Free + S&H, just $39, 2 Payments of $97, etc.
(Ex: coaching, ebook, dvd, book, supplement, software, report, etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: What is the big payoff of what you're selling?

fieldHint.hint1: Completes phrase "My product/service helps you with How To _____" (starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make more sales, lose weight, write a book, have more energy, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 benefit customers want from what you sell?

fieldHint.hint1: Completes phrase "I want to _____" (starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get more traffic, stop my pain, write my own book, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How fast does your product / service get results?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: 30 minutes, instantly, a single weekend, etc.
